## {{< meta ohpc.content.introduction.inputs.title >}}

{{< meta ohpc.content.introduction.inputs.paragraph1 >}}

|        Variable    |      Meaning     |
|--------------------|------------------|
| $\{sms\_name\}     | \# Hostname for SMS server |
| $\{sms\_ip\}       | \# Internal IP address on SMS server |
| $\{sms\_eth\_internal\} | \# Internal Ethernet interface on SMS |
::: {.content-visible when-profile="warewulf3"}
| $\{eth\_provision\} | \# Provisioning interface for computes |
:::
| \$\{internal\_netmask\} | \# Subnet netmask for internal network |
| \$\{ntp\_server\} | \# Local ntp server for time synchronization |
| \$\{bmc\_username\} | \# BMC username for use by IPMI |
| \$\{bmc\_password\} | \# BMC password for use by IPMI |
| \$\{num\_computes\} | \# Total \# of desired compute nodes |
| \$\{c\_ip[0]\}, \$\{c\_ip[1]\}, ... | \# Desired compute node addresses |
| \$\{c\_bmc[0]\}, \$\{c\_bmc[1]\}, ... | \# BMC addresses for computes |
| \$\{c\_mac[0]\}, \$\{c\_mac[1]\}, ... | \# MAC addresses for computes |
| \$\{c\_name[0]\}, \$\{c\_name[1]\}, ... | \# Host names for computes |
| \$\{compute\_regex\} | \# Regex matching all compute node names (e.g. *c\**) |
| \$\{compute\_prefix\} | \# Prefix for compute node names (e.g. *c*) |
::: {.content-visible when-profile="xCAT"}
| \$\{iso\_path\} | \# Directory location of OS iso for \xCAT{} install |
:::
::: {.content-visible unless-profile="xCAT"}
| \$\{synclist\} | \# Filesystem location of \xCAT{} synclist file |
:::
::: {.content-visible when-profile="xCAT"}
::: {.content-visible when-profile="stateful"}
| \$\{ohpc\_repo\_dir\} | \# Directory location of local \OHPC{} repository mirror |
| \$\{epel\_repo\_dir\} | \# Directory location of local EPEL repository mirror |
:::
:::

::: {.content-visible when-profile="xCAT"}
| $\{domain\_name\}  | \# Local network domain name |
:::

Optional:

|        Variable    |      Meaning     |
|--------------------|------------------|
::: {.content-visible when-profile="x86_64"}
| \$\{sysmgmtd\_host\} | \# BeeGFS System Management host name |
| \$\{mgs\_fs\_name\} | \# Lustre MGS mount name |
| \$\{sms\_ipoib\} | \# IPoIB address for SMS server |
| \$\{ipoib\_netmask\} | \# Subnet netmask for internal IPoIB |
| \$\{c\_ipoib[0]\}, \$\{c\_ipoib[1]\}, ... | \# IPoIB addresses for computes |
:::
::: {.content-visible when-profile="warewulf3"}
| \$\{kargs\} | \# Kernel boot arguments |
:::
| \$\{nagios\_web\_password\} | \# Nagios web access password |
